comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Speaking of tacky... This one, number 234 from SB's playbook, always goes something like this: "Today let's do one of the hardest rides in the Frenzy inventory, some greasy hill from Hell with an 18% grade. Since I'll be having veal medallions at the Bamboo Club w/ some of the guys from the President's Office, I may be late. Or not there at all, frankly, if the dessert tray looks halfway decent. But forge ahead without me, chappies!" See ya' at noon at Humanities. DU

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Eating words in ATLAS One less chappie today, after all... It turns out I'm stuck in the office w/ a class today. Bummer. DU
